snippet: The council ruled on Tuesday that notary publics could not refuse to perform same-sex marriage ceremonies, a decision that effectively legalizes gay marriage.
abstract: Council overseeing Brazil’s judiciary rules that notary publics cannot refuse to perform same-sex marriage ceremonies; decision opens way for gay couples across Latin America’s largest country to marry.
lead_paragraph: The council ruled on Tuesday that notary publics could not refuse to perform same-sex marriage ceremonies, a decision that effectively legalizes gay marriage.

headline.seo: Brazilian Court Council Removes a Barrier to Same-Sex Marriage
headline.main: Brazilian Court Council Removes a Barrier to Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Brazil Court Council Removes A Barrier to Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
